tableCreateSQL: CREATE TABLE `taobaoindex_trendindex` (  `details` text,  `lastdate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,  `startdate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,  `endDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,  `days` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,  `provinceNames` text,  `interestNames` text,  `totalUser` text,  `queries` text,  `types` text,  `hitKFC` bit(1) DEFAULT NULL) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
